thread.title: CALLING ALL SEAFOODIES! 3rd Annual Sobe Seafood Festival is Back OCTOBER 24, 2015!

author: cbs8
title: CALLING ALL SEAFOODIES! 3rd Annual Sobe Seafood Festival is Back OCTOBER 24, 2015!
text:
South Beach Seafood Festival
MIAMI BEACH, Fla. , Sept. 23, What do you get when you put pop up cafe's from Joe's Stone Crabs, Naked Taco, Red, the Steakhouse , Smith & Wollensky, Red Fish Grill , CJs Crab Shack, Drunken Dragon , A Fish Called Avalon, Oceanaire, City Hall the Restaurant , CIBO, Alter, Tarpon Bend, Poseidon, and Whole Foods Market together on the sands of Sobe with four blocks of fun for ONE DAY ONLY? That's right. It's the 3 rd Annual South Beach Seafood Festival, presented by Hess Wines and hosted by Coca-Cola, hitting the sands of South Beach October 21-24, 2015 , with the main festival to be held Saturday, October 24 from 1-9PM at 7 th & Ocean Drive in Miami Beach . Events will be happening all week to showcase the great culinary talent of Miami and kick off stone crab season. Wednesday will be the Hess Select Wine Pairing Evening at Joe's Stone Crab . Thursday night is the GOYA Foods's Cooking & Cocktails Interactive Dinner, hosted by STOLI, the Vodka . Friday night is the annual battle of all battles, Chef Showdown , where chefs will compete and guests are the judge, sponsored by Range Rover, Whole Foods, & Bacardi. And, Saturday features the all-day South Beach Seafood Festival. The event benefits Community Initiatives Foundation in support of the EAT SMART Campaign to fight against childhood hunger, childhood obesity, and assisting the community to find the perfect balance through nutritional awareness & individual development in Miami Dade County .
What makes us unique? These top Miami chefs will pop up not just a sampling zone, but create an EATING Paradise with over 50 Menu Items to choose from for ONE Day Only. It's not your typical seafood festival as thousands will flock to the sand to dive in to the freshest dishes from South Florida's best restaurants. Add on the open bar included in the ticket prices and it's a fun in the sun day. Enjoy Stone Crabs, Lobster Waffle Cones, Steak & Lobster Skewers, Shrimp Tacos, Oysters, Shrimp Cocktail, Gyros, Crab Cakes, Grouper in a Bag, Lobster Mac 'N Cheese and more. There will be live music, culinary and mixology demos, beach lounge parties, health village, kids zone, and VIP benefits for the all access guests, including all day Heineken Light College Football Sports Bar, the Land Rover Hospitality Village and GOYA Culinary Pavilion featuring an all day party. There is fun for all ages. Major sponsors include title sponsor, Hess Select Wines, Premier Beverage, Bacardi, Stoli the Vodka, and Herradura, presenting sponsors Coca-Cola, GOYA, Land Rover North & South Dade, and hosting sponsors Heineken Light and Whole Foods Market.
Tickets start at $25 and include complimentary all-day open bar*. Food is available for purchase between $5 - $10 . For more information & to purchase tickets, please visit sobeseafoodfest.com . Follow us @SobeSeafoodFest and #SobeSeafood!
For more information, contact:
Valerie Roy
valerie@ci-mgt.com
786-683-6397
